rules_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: [i]Those who journey below the sands for oldsteel find the lifestyle of those who journey into Sanctuary for food and water unacceptably hazardous. This view is reciprocated, which makes for wonderful trade.[/i]
